name: NinjaStack
overview:
ninjastack is a select team of experienced and skilled developers with a complete understanding of full stack web application development. our developers have a wide range of experience working with web startups, agencies and large scale corporate projects.

we specialize in aiding startups in turning their application ideas into functional prototypes quickly; efficiently turning initial startup investment into a viable product. we identify the need, simplify the implementation and execute development.

ninjastack embodies a full accessible responsive User Interface; bringing applications to all technologies - from desktop to tablet to mobile to TV. we work with various technologies to achieve the best quality of scalable performance from back to front. our favorites are node.js, html 5, javascript, css3, jquery, and mongodb.

as fans of open API systems, we believe that data should flow freely. some of our current projects involve integration of API’s like Facebook, Twitter, IMDB, Google Places, Google Charts, High Charts, Amazon, Tumblr, Flickr, Youtube, Chargify, Shopify and Stripe.
